name: Dark × Bambi
description:
What if Bambi happened in the Winden's forest?

A 3 minute (or is it?) visual novel with an overcomplicated plot that doesn't really makes sense, bad puns and time traveling deers.

Art from Bambi and Dark.

Music: Apparat / Goodbye (Instrumental)

All the art have been shamefully used without permission.

Sic mundus creatus est.
